synopsis.text: Brilliant biochemist and ruthless businesswoman Elexis Sinclaire will stop at nothing to achieve her twisted goal: to force the next step of human evolution, even if it means spelling doom for mankind. In the dystopian city of Freeport, the elite strike force HARDCORPS, led by Colonel John Blade, is the only thing standing in the way of rampant crime and corruption. As Blade investigates a series of mysterious kidnappings, he uncovers a sinister plot involving SinTEK, Elexis' corporation, and a wave of mutants terrorizing the city. With the fate of humanity hanging in the balance, Blade must unravel the mystery and save a mysterious girl named Elyse before it's too late. The world of SIN is a dark and dangerous place, and Blade is the only one who can stop Elexis' monstrous plan.
